spirit:addressBlock.spirit:name: some_register_map
spirit:addressBlock.spirit:description: This address map contains some example registers to show how RDL can be utilized in various situations.

spirit:field.spirit:name: STICKY_CONTROL_BIT
spirit:field.spirit:description: sticky control bit software lock bit when this bit is set to 1, the block 0/5/6 cannot be programmed, and this bit is sticky so that during the reset cycle, software can only set it one time and cannot set it back to 0.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_POWER_BYPASS
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse power regulator bypass 0 = don't use the power from fuse power regulator 1 = use the power from fuse power regulator

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_CLOCK_DIVIDER
spirit:field.spirit:description: clock divider value the clock divider value is used to select the clock frequency of the fuse serial clockclk_div_val==3'h0 ? 13'h1fff : //div by 8191 (max divider value) clk_div_val==3'h1 ? 13'h1388 : //div by 5000) 208m clk_div_val==3'h2 ? 13'h1388 : //div by 5000) 208m clk_div_val==3'h3 ? 13'h0ea6 : //div by 3750) 156m clk_div_val==3'h4 ? 13'h09c4 : //div by 2500104m clk_div_val==3'h5 ? 13'h06fc : //div by 1778 74m clk_div_val==3'h6 ? 13'h06fc : //div by 1778 74m div_clk_cntr; // programmable in aes_rf _28f8

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_CLOCK_DISABLE
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse clock disable 0 = enable fuse block clock 1 = disable fuse block clock

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_SOFTWARE_RESET
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse software reset 0 = fuse software reset is de-asserted 1 = fuse software reset is asserted

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BLOCK_NUMBER
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse block number select fuse block during fuse value programming. there are 16 x 256-bit fuse blocks in the <var product number>. during fuse value programming, allow software to program one fuse block at a time. the settings, fuse blocks, and their contents correspond to those described in the generic encryption fuse layout.

spirit:field.spirit:name: HIGH_VOLT_ENABLE
spirit:field.spirit:description: high volt enable 1 = enable the on-chip fuse power regulator to generate 2.5v for fuse programming it takes about 1 ms for the fuse power regulator to output stable power after this field is set.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BURN_FUSE_ENABLE
spirit:field.spirit:description: burn fuse enable 1 = enable fuse programming

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_LOCK
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse lock 1 = enable fuse locking feature

spirit:field.spirit:name: ENABLE_SOFT_FUSE_PROG
spirit:field.spirit:description: enable software fuse programming 1 = enable software fuse programming interface

spirit:field.spirit:name: SEL_FUSE_B
spirit:field.spirit:description: select to burning fuse b block if this bit is set to 0x1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: BROM_RTC
spirit:field.spirit:description: bcm brom rtc

spirit:field.spirit:name: ROM_SECURE_EN
spirit:field.spirit:description: rom secure enable when this bit and the global secure enable are set, rom access is secure. only the secure axi transaction can access secure rom data. otherwise, it is disabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ROM_CLK_GATING_CTRL
spirit:field.spirit:description: rom clock gating control 1 = rom clock is enabled

spirit:field.spirit:name: ROM_WAIT_STATE
spirit:field.spirit:description: rom wait state inserted number of waiting cycles during rom access

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_PROG_VAL1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Programming Value[127:0] in Software Fuse Programming Mode Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_3_0_31_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse programming value[127:0]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_PROG_VAL2
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Programming Value[255:128] in Software Fuse Programming Mode Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_7_4_31_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse programming value[255:128]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_APCFG1
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Application Subsystem Config Register 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: OTP_APP_TOP_CONFIG_15_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for application subsystem configuration [15:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: OTP_CP_TOP_CONFIG_15_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for communication subsystem configuration [15:0]

spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Application Subsystem Config Register 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: OTP_APP_TOP_CONFIG_47_16
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for application subsystem configuration [47:16]

spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Application Subsystem Config Register 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: OTP_APP_TOP_CONFIG_79_48
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for application subsystem configuration [79:48]

spirit:field.spirit:name: MANU_PARA_31_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for manufacturing parameters [31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for manufacturing parameters [63:32]

spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for manufacturing parameters [159:128]

spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[31:0]

spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 2

spirit:field.spirit:name: RKEY_63_32
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[63:32]

spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 3

spirit:field.spirit:name: RKEY_95_64
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[95:64]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_ROOT_KEY4
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 4

spirit:field.spirit:name: REKY_127_96
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[127:96]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_ROOT_KEY5
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 5

spirit:field.spirit:name: RKEY_159_128
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[159:128]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_ROOT_KEY6
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 6

spirit:field.spirit:name: RKEY_191_160
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[191:160]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_ROOT_KEY7
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 7

spirit:field.spirit:name: RKEY_223_192
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[223:192]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_ROOT_KEY8
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Root Key Register 8

spirit:field.spirit:name: RKEY_255_224
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for root key[255:224]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_SSK_1_8
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for Secret Symmetric Key SSK 1- 8

spirit:field.spirit:name: OTP_SSK_31_0
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for ssk [31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK6
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank6[31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: LOCK_BIT
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse lock bit this field records the 16 fuse lock bits for 16 fuse blocks. bit [0] is for block 0, bit [1] is for block 1â€¦bit [15] is for block 15.

spirit:field.spirit:name: LIFE_CYCLE
spirit:field.spirit:description: life cycle fuse bits there are 12-bit fuse bits for life cycle.

spirit:field.spirit:name: GE_FUSE_READY205
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse ready 1 = fuse value is stable and ready to be read

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BURN_DONE
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse burn done 1 = fuse write process is done

spirit:field.spirit:name: DRNG_DATA
spirit:field.spirit:description: digital random data from drng

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK7
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank7[31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK8
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank8[31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK9
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank9[31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK10
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank10[31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK11
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank11[31:0]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_CDPKH_1_8
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for BANK3 Chip Debug Public Key Hash CDPKH1- 8

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK3_CDPKH
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank3 chip debug public key hash cdpkh[31:0]

spirit:register.spirit:name: GEU_FUSE_VAL_ROTPKH_1_8
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Value for BANK4 Root of Trust Public Key Hash ROTPKH1- 8

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK4_ROTPKH
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank4 root of trust public key hash rotpkh[31:0]

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_BANK5_ARCN
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse value for bank5 arcn[31:0]

spirit:register.spirit:name: FUSE_SCLK_DIV_CNTR
spirit:register.spirit:description: Fuse Slow Clock Divider Counter Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: FUSE_SCLK_DIV_CNTR
spirit:field.spirit:description: fuse sclk divider counter the clock divider value is used to manually define clock frequency of the fuse serial clock. sclk = wtm clk /this value. it only takes effect when geu_config[27:25] = 0x7
